Get the lowest price ever on a loaded MacBook Air - Image credit: Apple

Holiday Apple deals are ramping up on Amazon, and this loaded M3 MacBook Air makes one excellent gift at the lowest price on record.

Whether you're picking up the M3 MacBook Air 13-inch for yourself or a loved one, this loaded spec is sure to please thanks to an upgrade to 24GB unified memory and 512GB of storage. At $1,299, which is $200 off retail, it also delivers the lowest price on record since Apple increased the base amount of RAM in the M3 Air to 16GB last month.

And while this deal stands out as one of the best we've seen all year long, there are several other MacBook Air discounts in effect if you're looking for additional screen real estate or sticking to a budget. Here are a few top choices:

13-inch models

  • 13" M2, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $749 ($250 off)
  • 13" M3, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $899 ($200 off)
  • 13" M3, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,099 ($200 off)
  • 13" M3, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,299 ($200 off)

15-inch models

  • 15" M3, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $1,099 ($200 off)
  • 15" M3, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,299 ($200 off)
  • 15" M3, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,499 ($200 off)

Even more early Black Friday deals to check out

With Apple's abundance of hardware releases in the recent weeks, there are plenty of offers to grab in our Apple Price Guide that can be used alongside the M3 MacBook Air. Here's just a sampling of the trending discounts ahead of Black Friday:
